column4: I believe you mean to make an empty text file. The "nano" is a text-mode text editor I use for anything done text-wise in text-mode. "nano FILENAME.EXTENSION" where 'FILENAME' is the file's name and 'EXTENSION' the extension of the file, like "py" for a Python script.
It would sound like you don't even know the basics of Linux.
exactly i dont know anything thats why im asking help.
You're not asking, you're repeating. That's why in IRC we always say your username as the first thing in a reply to catch your attention.
